Text: Green Power Production Cc Richard I spoke to Dave Gunther earlier today regarding the EES and Green Power agreements He directed me to you Can you tell us if EES has terminated the agreements with Green Power If so I would like to get confirmation of the termination in writing Thank you for your assistance Kathleen Forwarded by Kathleen CroisetEWCEnron on PM From Kathleen Croiset AM To Marion NRON Barry NRON John NRON John NRON cc Tony nron Dave nronXGate Subject RE Green Power Production Do any of you know if EES has terminated the agreement with Green Power Let me know Thanks Kathleen Forwarded by Kathleen CroisetEWCEnron on AM From Jim nronXgate on AM CST To Kathleen NRON cc Subject RE Green Power Production Kathleen Here is the meter It stops at I am wondering if Enron no longer serves as a Scheduling Coordinator for any generation And therefore we no longer receive any meter data for the wind units That doesnt mean that they didnt produce energy We may simply not be capturing it after Let me know what you find out I am going to ask around here too Jim Original Message From Croiset Kathleen Sent Monday January PM To Reyes James Subject RE Green Power Production Jim I confirmed with our Regional Manager John Nemila in Palm Springs that the Green Power project generated production for the entire month of December Unfortunately the reports that I get like the ones I sent you are by turbine number and only give a monthtodate total John Nemila did not have any reports of metering problems If you could try to download the data again we would greatly appreciate it Otherwise we will have to estimate production Thanks Kathleen From Jim nronXgate on PM CST To Kathleen NRON cc Subject RE Green Power Production Kathleen I appreciate the file you sent me but I dont see any meter after the th or th Im not sure how your file compares to the meter in system Perhaps you could help me understand how your meter would correlate to meter in the generation report The other point is that we stopped generating early in the month with other generators I assumed that the wind were no exception Jim Original Message From Croiset Kathleen Sent Monday January PM To Reyes James Cc Stidman Marina Subject Green Power Production Jim Thanks for the data I compared your data for meters and and the production that I show looks like an entire months production Could you try to download data for the th to the st Here are copies of the data for meters and File SFXpdf I could not retrieve the data for meter Thanks Kathleen From Jim nronXgate on PM CST To Kathleen NRON cc Subject RE File Dec Windzip I am sorry it is late I was out last week and my coworker was supposed to have sent the information There is no more generation after Jim Original Message From Croiset Kathleen Sent Thursday January AM To Reyes James Subject If possible could you please send the December production for Green Power We are closing our books tomorrow Thank you Kathleen
